author: Tristan Rhodes (https://victrisgames.itch.io/)
description:
The `Value` expression will return the position of the slider on the bar, from 0 to 1, where 0 is the left-side, and 1 is the right-side.

You can [watch this tutorial](https://youtu.be/iiTUwdAT_hs) showing how to use this extension - remember to attach it to a **Shape Painter** object.
name: DraggableSliderControl
shortDescription: Use a shape-painter object to draw a horizontal slider that can be dragged by the users.

eventsBasedBehaviors.description:
Use a shape-painter object to draw a horizontal slider that can be dragged by the users. 

The `Value` expression will return the position of the slider on the bar, from 0 to 1, where 0 is the left-side, and 1 is the right-side.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: DraggableSliderControl

events.comment: Move slider when being dragged
Enforce left boundry
Enforce right boundry
Use darker halo while being dragged
End sliding and update variables
Update "Value" based on the location of the thumb
Set inactive track parameters (by default, use thumb color)
Draw half circle at end (optional)
Draw inactive track
Set active track parameters (by default, use thumb color)
Draw half circle at end (optional)
Draw active track (2 pixels bigger than property)
Prepare thumb settings
Draw Circle thumb
Draw Rectangle thumb
Make sure thumb width is not smaller than track height (to prevent track ends from showing)
Detect hover/touch/click (but only if the layer and object is visible, and the object is not already being dragged)
Detect mouse clicks near track, start dragging
Draw halo when the mouse is hovering over thumb

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the slider is being dragged.
eventsFunctions.name: IsBeingDragged
eventsFunctions.sentence: Slider _PARAM0_ is being dragged using the _PARAM1_ behavior

events.comment: Make sure object gets re-drawn every frame

eventsFunctions.name: SetInactiveTrackOpacity
eventsFunctions.sentence: Set inactive track opacity of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.name: SetActiveTrackOpacity
eventsFunctions.sentence: Set active track opacity of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Change shape of thumb (circle or rectangle)
eventsFunctions.fullName: Change shape of thumb (circle or rectangle)
eventsFunctions.name: SetThumbShape

eventsFunctions.description: Change the color of the track that is LEFT of the thumb.
eventsFunctions.name: SetActiveTrackColor
eventsFunctions.sentence: Set active track color of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Change the color of the track that is RIGHT of the thumb.
eventsFunctions.name: SetInactiveTrackColor
eventsFunctions.sentence: Set inactive track color of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Change the color of thumb to a specific value.
eventsFunctions.name: SetThumbColor

eventsFunctions.description: Change the value of a slider to a specific value (this will move the thumb to the correct position).
eventsFunctions.name: SetValue

events.comment: Set the proper offset (this is move the slider)

eventsFunctions.description: The value of the slider (based on position of the thumb).
eventsFunctions.name: Value

propertyDescriptors.label: Shape of the thumb. Either "circle" or "rectangle".
propertyDescriptors.name: ThumbShape

propertyDescriptors.label: Color string for the thumb. Example:  24;119;211
propertyDescriptors.name: ThumbColor

propertyDescriptors.label: Color string for the track that is RIGHT of the thumb. Example:  24;119;211  (Leave blank to use thumb color)
propertyDescriptors.name: InactiveTrackColor

propertyDescriptors.label: Opacity of the track that is RIGHT of the thumb.  Example: 96
propertyDescriptors.name: InactiveTrackOpacity

propertyDescriptors.label: Color string for the track that is LEFT of the thumb. Example:  24;119;211 (Leave blank to use thumb color)
propertyDescriptors.name: ActiveTrackColor

propertyDescriptors.label: Opacity of the track that is LEFT of the thumb.  Example: 255
propertyDescriptors.name: ActiveTrackOpacity

propertyDescriptors.label: Size of halo when the mouse hovers and clicks on the thumb. Example: 24
propertyDescriptors.name: HaloRadius

propertyDescriptors.label: Opacity of halo when the mouse hovers on the thumb. Example: 32
propertyDescriptors.name: HaloOpacityHover

propertyDescriptors.label: Opacity of the halo that appears when the mouse clicks on the thumb. Example: 64
propertyDescriptors.name: HaloOpacityClick

propertyDescriptors.label: True if the thumb is being dragged
propertyDescriptors.name: IsBeingDragged

propertyDescriptors.label: Range (0,1) based on the thumb position on the track.  0=left, 1=right
propertyDescriptors.name: Value

propertyDescriptors.label: Number of pixels the thumb is from the left side of the track.
propertyDescriptors.name: ThumbOffset

propertyDescriptors.label: If true, round the ends of the track.
propertyDescriptors.name: RoundedTrack
